remarks: Isomorphism H for a lattice ` K ` .  Definition of isomorphism map in [Crawley] p. 122 line 3.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Jan-2014.)
statement:

dihval.c $e |- C = ( ( DIsoC ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihval.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.

dihfval $p |- ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) -> I = ( x e. B |-> if ( x .<_ W , ( D ` x ) , ( iota_ u e. S A. q e. A ( ( -. q .<_ W /\ ( q .\/ ( x ./\ W ) ) = x ) -> u = ( ( C ` q ) .(+) ( D ` ( x ./\ W ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
